192.168.5.14/24

192 = 128 + 64 
168 = 128 + 32 + 8

11000000.10110000.00000101.00001110 = 192.168.5.14
11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000 = /24
00000000.00000000.00000000.11111111 = complement /24

192.168.5.14 & 24 adresa de rețea  192.168.5.0
192.168.5.14 | 24 adresa de broadcast  192.168.5.255
=====================================================
192.168.5.14/25

11000000.10110000.00000101.00001110 = 192.168.5.14
11111111.11111111.11111111.10000000 = /25
00000000.00000000.00000000.01111111 = complement /25

192.168.5.14 & 25 adresa de rețea  192.168.5.0
192.168.5.14 | 25 adresa de broadcast  192.168.5.127
=====================================================
10.10.10.0/8

00001010.00001010.00001010.00000000 = 10.10.10.0
11111111.00000000.00000000.00000000 = /8
00000000.11111111.11111111.11111111 = complement /8

10.10.10.0 & 8 adresa de rețea 10.0.0.0
10.10.10.0 | 8 adresa de broadcast 10.255.255.255

=====================================================
172.16.4.254/22

172 = 128 + 32 + 8 + 4 

10101100.00010000.00000100.11111110 = 172.16.4.254
11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000 = /22
00000000.00000000.00000011.11111111 = complement /22

172.16.4.254 & 22 adresa de rețea 172.16.4.0
172.16.4.254 | 22 adresa de broadcast 172.16.7.255
